languages.text: "После всех страданий, что мон-кай причинили детям Крудараха. После кары, что мы обрушили на этот мир... Сердце мое остается неспокойно, зная, что мы лишь на время проглотили обиды и разошлись сегодня без боя".

traits.locale_text: "После всех страданий, что мон-кай причинили детям Крудараха. После кары, что мы обрушили на этот мир... Сердце мое остается неспокойно, зная, что мы лишь на время проглотили обиды и разошлись сегодня без боя".

languages.text: "After all the suffering that the mon-keigh have inflicted upon the children of Crudarach. After all the punishment we have inflicted upon this world... My heart remains troubled, knowing that we have only tempered our grudges for a time and have parted without bloodshed today."
languages.original_text: "После всех страданий, что мон-кай причинили детям Крудараха. После кары, что мы обрушили на этот мир... Сердце мое остается неспокойно, зная, что мы лишь на время проглотили обиды и разошлись сегодня без боя".

traits.locale_text: "After all the suffering that the mon-keigh have inflicted upon the children of Crudarach. After all the punishment we have inflicted upon this world... My heart remains troubled, knowing that we have tempered our grudges but for a while and parted without a fight today."

"After all the suffering that the mon-keigh have inflicted upon the children of Crudarach. After all the punishment we have inflicted upon this world... My heart remains troubled, knowing that we have tempered our grudges but for a while and parted without a fight today."

"After all the suffering that the mon-keigh have inflicted upon the children of Crudarach. After all the punishment we have inflicted upon this world... My heart remains troubled, knowing that we have only tempered our grudges for a time and have parted without bloodshed today."

"After all the suffering that the mon-keigh have inflicted upon the children of Crudarach. After all the punishment we have inflicted upon this world... My heart remains troubled, knowing that we have only tempered our grudges for a time and have parted without bloodshed today."

languages.text: «Después de todo el sufrimiento que los mon-keigh han infligido a los hijos de Crudarach. Después de todo el castigo que hemos infligido nosotros a este mundo... Marcho con el corazón atribulado, sabiendo que solo hemos atemperado momentáneamente nuestro rencor y nos hemos separado hoy sin derramar sangre».
languages.original_text: "After all the suffering that the mon-keigh have inflicted upon the children of Crudarach. After all the punishment we have inflicted upon this world... My heart remains troubled, knowing that we have only tempered our grudges for a time and have parted without bloodshed today."

traits.locale_text: «Después de todo el sufrimiento que los mon-keigh han infligido a los hijos de Crudarach. Después de todo el castigo que hemos infligido nosotros a este mundo... Marcho con el corazón atribulado, sabiendo que hemos atemperado momentáneamente nuestro rencor y nos hemos separado hoy sin luchar».

languages.text: “猴子给克鲁达拉赫之子造成了那么多痛苦，我们也对这个世界施加了那么多惩罚……尽管我们暂且放下了怨恨，没有爆发任何流血冲突便安然离去，但我心中仍感到很不安。”
languages.original_text: "After all the suffering that the mon-keigh have inflicted upon the children of Crudarach. After all the punishment we have inflicted upon this world... My heart remains troubled, knowing that we have only tempered our grudges for a time and have parted without bloodshed today."

traits.locale_text: “猴子给克鲁达拉赫之子造成了那么多痛苦，我们也对这个世界施加了那么多惩罚……尽管我们暂且放下了怨恨，没有爆发任何冲突便安然离去，但我心中仍感到很不安。”

languages.text: « Après toutes les souffrances que les mon-keigh ont fait subir aux enfants de Crudarach, après tous les châtiments que nous avons infligés à ce monde... mon cœur reste troublé en sachant que nous avons modéré nos rancœurs pour quelque temps et qu'aujourd'hui, nous nous sommes quittés sans nous battre. »
languages.original_text: "After all the suffering that the mon-keigh have inflicted upon the children of Crudarach. After all the punishment we have inflicted upon this world... My heart remains troubled, knowing that we have only tempered our grudges for a time and have parted without bloodshed today."

traits.locale_text: « Après toutes les souffrances que les mon-keigh ont fait subir aux enfants de Crudarach, après tous les châtiments que nous avons infligés à ce monde... mon cœur reste troublé en sachant que nous avons modéré nos rancœurs pour quelque temps et qu'aujourd'hui, nous nous sommes quittés sans nous battre. »

languages.text: 「モン＝ケイがクルダラの子らに与えた苦しみの後。我々がこの世界に与えた罰の後…私の心は悩みに苛まれたままだ。ゆえにこそ、我々はしばしの間、恨みをを和らげ、今日、血を流さずに分かれることができる」
languages.original_text: "After all the suffering that the mon-keigh have inflicted upon the children of Crudarach. After all the punishment we have inflicted upon this world... My heart remains troubled, knowing that we have only tempered our grudges for a time and have parted without bloodshed today."

traits.locale_text: 「モン＝ケイがクルダラの子らに与えた苦しみの後。我々がこの世界に与えた罰の後…私の心は悩みに苛まれたままだ。ゆえにこそ、我々はしばしの間、恨みをを和らげ、今日、戦わずに分かれることができる」

languages.text: "Nach all dem Leid, das die Chem-Pan-Sey den Kindern von Crudarach zugefügt haben. Nach all den Strafen, die wir dieser Welt zugefügt haben ... Nach all dem ist mein Herz noch immer unruhig, weil ich weiß, dass wir unseren Groll nur für kurze Zeit besänftigt haben und heute ohne Blutvergießen auseinandergegangen sind."
languages.original_text: "After all the suffering that the mon-keigh have inflicted upon the children of Crudarach. After all the punishment we have inflicted upon this world... My heart remains troubled, knowing that we have only tempered our grudges for a time and have parted without bloodshed today."

traits.locale_text: "Nach all dem Leid,das die Chem-Pan-Sey den Kindern von Crudarach zugefügt haben. Nach all den Strafen, die wir dieser Welt zugefügt haben ... Nach all dem ist mein Herz noch immer unruhig, weil ich weiß, dass wir unseren Groll für kurze Zeit besänftigt haben und heute ohne Kampf auseinandergegangen sind."

languages.text: "Mon-keighlerin Crudarach'ın çocuklarına yaşattığı onca acıdan sonra... Bizim bu dünyaya çektirdiğimiz onca çileden sonra... Kinimizi yalnızca bir süreliğine yatıştırdığımızı ve bugün hiç kan dökülmeden yollarımızı ayırdığımızı bildiğimden olsa gerek, yüreğimde hâlâ sıkkınlık yer ediyor."
languages.original_text: "After all the suffering that the mon-keigh have inflicted upon the children of Crudarach. After all the punishment we have inflicted upon this world... My heart remains troubled, knowing that we have only tempered our grudges for a time and have parted without bloodshed today."

traits.locale_text: "Mon-keighlerin Crudarach'ın çocuklarına yaşattığı onca acıdan sonra... Bizim bu dünyaya çektirdiğimiz onca çileden sonra... Kinimizi yalnızca bir süreliğine yatıştırdığımızı ve bugün hiç kan dökülmeden yollarımızı ayırdığımızı bildiğimden olsa gerek, yüreğimde hâlâ sıkkınlık yer ediyor."
